C1. Is ____ born in General Santos City? (Enter Code)
C2. Is ___'s birth was registered with the civil registry? (Enter code)
C2.a. What was the reason why ___'s birth was not registered with the civil registry? (Enter code)
C3. How old is ___ as of his/her last birthday
C4. If married, what is the type of marriage of ___? (Enter code)
C5. If 3 years ago ___ resides outside General Santos City, What is/are your reasons/s of migrating to General Santos City and as a place of destination? (Enter Code)
D6. What is the name of the school where ___is currently enrolled in? (Enter Code)
D7. What is the usual mode of transport used by ___ in going to school? (Enter Code)
E8. If __was employed or in business related to fishing, what type of fishing does ___ do? (Enter Code)
E9. What is the usual mode of transport used by ___ in going to work (Enter Code)
E10.a. If NO, is ___ interested to be a member of a Cooperative? (Enter the code)
E11. Did __ avail of any credit service/facility in the past month? (Enter code)
E12. Do you want to avail livelihood training? (Enter code)
E13. Did __ avail any financing programs in the past 6 months? (Enter Code)
E13.a. What amount did __ availed?
E14. Is there a presence of business activity in the residence?
F15. Is __ coughing for two weeks or more prior to this interview?
F15.a. Has __ been diagnosed of TB? (Enter Code)
F16. If __ visited any health facility, what is usual mode of transport of transport used by __ in going to the health facility?
F17. Did the mother had prenatal care before __ was delivered?
F17.a. Where was ___ delivered? (Enter Code)
F17.b. Who attended in the delivery of __? (Enter Code)
F17.c. Did __ undergo newborn screening?
F17.d. Do you have a card where __'s vaccination are written down? (Enter Code)
F17.E1. Is __ received BCG vaccination?
F17.E2. Is __ received Penta1 vaccination?
F17.E3. Is __ received Penta2 vaccination?
F17.E4. Is __ received Penta3 vaccination?
F17.E5. Is __ received OPV1 vaccination?
F17.E6. Is __ received OPV2 vaccination?
F17.E7. Is __ received OPV3 vaccination?
F17.E8. Is __ received HepaB1 vaccination?
F17.E9. Is __ received Measles vaccination?
F17.f. Was __ exclusively breastfed?
F18. Is __ currently sick with measles?
F19. Was __ given Vitamin A supplementation 6 months prior to interview?
F20. Did __ have dental check-up in the past 6 months?
F21. Is __ currently using a method to delay or avoid pregnancy?
F21.a. Where did __ recently obtain the service or commodity? (Enter Code)
F22. If __ is currently pregnant,did __ see anyone for prenatal care for this pregnancy?
F22.a. During this pregnancy, was __ given Tetanus Toxoid/Tetanus Diptheria vaccine?
F22.b. As of today, how many Tetanus Toxoid/Tetanus Diptheria injections did __ received?
F23. How many living children does? __ have?
F24. Does __ want additional children?
G. HOUSING AND HOUSEHOLD CHARACTERISTICS
G25. Observed structural condition of main dwelling unit
H. FOOD SECURITY

EditText.android:hint: H27. How many times does the household eat in a day?

TextView.android:text: H28. A household usually serves a variety of food, in your case, how many days were the following foods served in a meal eaten by the household in the past 7 days
H29.When you buy a kilo of rice, for how many day/s is it usually good for?
I. BACKYARD GARDEN
I30. Does your household or any members of your household plant vegetables in the vicinity of the house?
I31. Does your household or any members of your household plant tree in the vicinity of the house?
J. OWNERSHIP OF HOUSEHOLD ASSETS
J32. Does your household or any members of your household own fishpond?
If Yes, how many?
K. OWNERSHIP AND IMMUNIZATION OF DOGS AND CATS
K33. Does your household or any members of your household own dogs/cats
If yes,
K33-B. How does the household took care of dogs/cats
K33-C. Are your dogs immunized against rabies starting three (3) months old and yearly?
L. CLIMATE CHANGE AND DISASTER RISK MANAGEMENT
L34. Is there a member in the household knowledgeable on disaster preparedness?
L34-A. If yes?
L34.B What type of training was _____ undergone regarding disaster preparedness?
L35. Is there a disaster alert system currently practised in your community or Barangay?
L35-A. If yes, how is information disseminated?(Check as many)
M. GOVERNMENT FACILITIES
M36. What government infrastructure have you used?(Check as many)
M37. What government infrastructure facilities do you want in your barangay in the next three (3) years? (Check only 3 boxes)
N. HUMAN RESOURCE MANAGEMENT IN THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNIT
N38. Have you experienced having transaction/s with our government unit?
N38.A. If YES,how often?
N38.B. Are you satisfied with the services of our employees?
N38.C. Were you served within time expected? Or did it take so long for you to be served?
N38-D. Do you think that LGU employees are competent enough to do their jobs?
N38.E. In what aspect are you not satisfied or where the employees need more improvement?
N38.F. In your opinion,does the government have enough personnel to attend to the needs of the public?
O. PRIORITY CONCERNS
O39. Prioritize the concerns listed below. Put numbers 1 to 10 before each concern according to your priority. (1 as top priority,10 as the least)
